com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Interface IView<D>

Type Parameters:
D - data type
All Superinterfaces:
IModelListener<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Form, View
public interface IView<D>
extends IModelListener<D>

The view is the graphical part of the application, get datas from model use controler to action on the system. This interface dont use any GWT class, but View did.

          Give the Dom w3c Id of the view element
